DOC.brief_summary: The study examines the effects of delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (Δ9-THC), the principal active ingredient of cannabis, on neural synchrony. Neural synchrony is studied using electroencephalography (EEG).
DOC.brief_title: Cannabinoids, Neural Synchrony, and Information Processing
DOC.criteria: Men and women aged 18 and 55 years (extremes included) on the day of the first dosing. Exposed to cannabis at least once. 1. Cannabis naïve 2. Positive pregnancy screen during screening 3. Hearing deficits
